WakeLockSentinel.summary: The WakeLockSentinel interface of the Screen Wake Lock API provides a handle to the underlying platform wake lock and can be manually released and reacquired. An {{jsxref('Object')}} representing the wake lock is returned via the method.

remarks.para: An acquired WakeLockSentinel can be released manually via the method, or automatically via the platform wake lock. This can happen if the document becomes inactive or looses visibility, if the device is low on power or the user turns on a power save mode. Releasing all WakeLockSentinel instances of a given wake lock type will cause the underlying platform wake lock to be released.
